Package pt.ipp.isep.dei.esoft.project.repository

Class ToDoListRepository

java.lang.Object
pt.ipp.isep.dei.esoft.project.repository.ToDoListRepository
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ToDoListRepository extends Object implements Serializable
Repository class for managing a list of ToDoEntry objects.

    • registerToDoEntry

      public Optional<ToDoEntry> registerToDoEntry(GreenSpace greenSpace, String title, String description, int urgency, int expectedDuration)
      Registers a new ToDoEntry object and adds it to the repository.
      Parameters:
      greenSpace - the green space associated with the entry.
      title - the title of the entry.
      description - the description of the entry.
      urgency - the urgency level of the entry.
      expectedDuration - the expected duration of the entry.
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the registered ToDoEntry object, or empty if registration fails.

    • add

      public void add(ToDoEntry entry)
      Adds an entry to the to-do list.
      Parameters:
      entry - the ToDoEntry object to be added.

    • getUrgency

      public ToDoEntry.Urgency[] getUrgency()
      Retrieves the urgency levels available for ToDoEntry objects.
      Returns:
      an array of Urgency enums.

    • getToDoListForResponsible

      public List<ToDoEntry> getToDoListForResponsible(String responsible)
      Retrieves a list of ToDoEntry objects for the specified responsible person.
      Parameters:
      responsible - the responsible person.
      Returns:
      a list of ToDoEntry objects assigned to the specified person.
